Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback (of B. culicivorus) from a pair in semi-evergreen woodland. Part of a mixed-species flock being drawn in by Glaucidium imitation (audible on recording).
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Cantorchilus leucotis,Herpsilochmus longirostris,Tolmomyias sulphurescens,Myiothlypis flaveola,Hylophilus pectoralis
